title: Twelve Minutes till Midnight
description: It’s late May 1934. A man catches a ride on a dusty Louisiana road only to find he’s traveling with notorious outlaws Bonnie and Clyde.  The suspense is nonstop as confrontation settles in between a man determined to stand on truth and an outlaw determined to dislocate him from it.  If your life is subject to living a lie rather than holding to the truth, which would you do?  “Twelve Minutes till Midnight will take you on an unforgettable ride.”
author: Oliver Phipps
